Vendor: Uniform Craft
Type: Mens Formal Shirt
Price: 675.00

Fabric

  • Polyester Viscose Blend
  • Not Bleach Resistant
  • Colour may vary according to screen setting & resolution

Uniforms

  • Comfort Fit
  • 2 side pockets & 1 back pocket
  • Unfinished length of 44"

Wash care

Our uniforms lasts long if you care for it right.

  • Warm Machine Wash with similar colours
  • Wash Inside out
  • DO NOT bleach
  • Line dry in shade
  • Warm Iron
